message.name: INF_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_PARENT_TERM_ONLY
message.locale: This service is already indexed by the parent term %1s.

message.name: INF_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_CHILD_TERM_ONLY
message.locale: This service is already indexed by the child term %1s.

message.name: INF_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_MULTIPLECHILD_TERMS
message.locale: This service is already indexed by the child terms %1s.

message.name: INF_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_PROVIDEROFEERING_INDEXDED
message.locale: The service has been indexed differently for the following provider (s): %1s

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_INDEXED_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: This service is already indexed with the term %1s.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_INDEX_MORE
message.locale: Please select single taxonomy term for indexing.

message.name: ERR_GSS_SEARCH_SERVICE__XRV_DOWN
message.locale: Generic Search Service is down. Please start the service.

message.name: ERR_GSS_SEARCH_SERVICE_TEMPORARLY_XRV_UNVAIALBLE
message.locale: Generic Search Service is unavailable for temporary period. Please try later.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_CAN_NOT_INDEXED_CLOSED_PROVIDER
message.locale: Taxonomy Term cannot be indexed for closed provider

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_CAN_NOT_ENTER_SEARCH_CRITERIA
message.locale: Please enter either name or code as search criteria

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_TERM_NOT_SELECTED_FOR_INDEXING
message.locale: Please select the taxonomy term for indexing

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_XRV_UNAVAILABLE
message.locale: No matching service could be found.
